attributes.action: Allow travel insurance for cancer patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Health Insurance companies are penalising cancer patients and people with chronic illness and adding to their burden by not allowing them to travel without paying a huge excess.

The reason is "ongoing medical condition".  This is so unfair patients can get remission for months or even a couple of years but you have to be free of hospital appointments for 5 years.

Please please change this

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow travel insurance for cancer patients."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14176.asp

Prime Minister's Office
